casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

November, 1941.

(November 7, 1941.) The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v. James Passero, Appellant.

Judgment of conviction affirmed. All concur. (The judgment convicts defendant on sixty-eight counts of an indictment charging him with criminally receiving and holding stolen property.) Present — Crosby, P. J., Cunningham, Taylor, Dowling and MeCurn, JJ.
